name: Scott Cusack
text: The stuffed pizzas are fantastic. My two boys live the 5 meat stuffed pizza. It is very good and surprisingly not greasy. I prefer the veggie stuffed pizza. If you haven't had one of these, it's a pizza within a pizza. The crust is great and it's very filling. You do have to bake it at home but it makes it taste that much more fresh.

name: Ashley Collins
text: Omg Love Papa Murphy‚Äôs‚ù§Ô∏èWhen I visited Houston for a year, this was one of the go to spots for take n bake pizza. They were everywhere... so I had to try it! üëåüèΩI must say. Create your owns, personal pizzas, cookie dough, and salads. Also EBT Friendlyüëç

name: Brendon Tatman
text: CLOSED as of may 6th 2019. Big shame! I grew up with Papa Murphy's and it's absolutely worth the trip from LA. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jennifer Early
text: I love being able to take my pizza home to make when I am ready. All fresh ingredients. Staff is awesome. Clean store. I go here once a week. I won't buy pizza anywhere else in town.

name: Anthony Bravo
text: I am giving this place only 2 stars not because of the quality of food or even the folks that prepare the food, but because of whoever the old lady is who seems to be running the place. I‚Äôve been to this location at least 20 times. Every ‚Ä¶More

name: Rachel Stephens
text: Great place sad they are closing nice owner

name: John Vidic
text: Really like thier pizza.  They made my pizza while I shopped next door, got it home and had fresh baked in 15 min.

name: Britney Cannon
text: I absolutely love their pizzas. First reason you get great quality ingredients. Second you get to bake it yourself so you know it will be hot and not warmed in a warmer. Last it's super affordable.

name: Christina Andrews
text: This is a friendly, professional, efficient business that offers an excellent value for great pizza. Cynthia is the manager (owner?) and is energetic and helpful. She treats all of her customers with respect and kindness.

name: William Halverstadt
text: Finally, it's about time we got a Papa Murphy's! This is the best pizza for the most affordable price. Watch out all you other pizza restaurants PM's is going to shut you down. We love the chicken and bacon w/ white sauce Chicago style. Call in your order, pick it up, take it home, throw it in the oven, Boom! Amazing pizza.

name: Debbie Warner
text: Very friendly owners. Every pizza we have tried has been very tasty. Good fresh ingredients. Store is very clean.

name: Erin Ferrell
text: Love. Great service, fresh food, great price. No brainer to give it 5 stars.

name: Patrick Gilbert
text: Great place! Staff was friendly, pizza was great!

name: Snoopy FPV
text: Best pizza place in town! Friendly an awesome service!

name: Brittany Shakespeare McKinley
text: The pizzas are ALWAYS good! Fresh and ready for the oven, they never taste like a cardboard box. EAT THE CHICKEN GARLIC!

name: Vanessa F. H.
text: Delicious pizza & perfect dough. I just wish they baked the pizza as well.

name: Kyle Quigley
text: The place looks like it's out of business

name: Kerry Suprenant
text: It was delicious pizza! The plain cheese (kids usual request) had great flavor. We also got a bbq chicken & bacon pizza that bests CPK any day!

name: Joan Hartman
text: Pizza is excellent.  Staff is very nice and helpful!

name: Teresa Heater
text: So fresh, love the gourmet vegetarian pizza.  Super friendly

name: cathy brown
text: You gotta try this place, their Pizza's are absolutely amazing, wow!!

name: Paul Porter
text: Great place to get quality pizza, gave 4 stars because it takes a while make.

name: Brie Fainblit
text: Gotta bake the pizza at home... The pan they send to bake on is too flimsy

name: Ron Rasberry
text: Best pizza ever and so amazingly fresh. So happy they finally got one out here.

name: Levine Frial
text: They love what they do... no wonder their pizzas taste so good!!

name: Sarah Ariza
text: Very helpful, quick, and friendly service. Ingredients fresh and good quality.

name: Jade OIC
text: Make your Own.  All on the Maker. Taken home and cook Fantastic

name: Clyde Merrick
text: Pretty damn good take-n-bake pizza to enjoy at home. Call ahead, and you'll be in and out in minutes.

name: Stacie S
text: Great customer service and food

name: Roger Welch
text: Love this place. You can taste the love.

name: Charlotte Vannordheim
text: Best pizza ever! Totally worth it and fresh

name: Dave Hardy
text: Wonderfully tasty pizzas. Great staff, helpful & friendly.

name: J A
text: Great customer service and are quick to get you your order!

name: Jacqueline Phillips
text: They made the wrong pizza

name: Lisa Mckellips
text: Always fresh, fast and affordable.

name: Mutt Lee
text: Best pizza in town!

name: Robert Frye
text: LOVE this pizza!!!

name: Adrien Rocha
text: The owner seemed very abrasive, not welcoming at all.

name: Bud Turner
text: You gotta get the "Classic Italian"

name: Yvonne R
text: Best Pizza!

name: shannon lupica
text: Absolutely wonderful
